articles.title: China gives up 2023 Asian Cup hosting rights: AFC - CNA
articles.description:
HONG KONG: China has relinquished its rights to host the 2023 Asian Cup finals due to the COVID-19 situation in the country, the Asian Football Confederation (AFC) announced on Saturday.

articles.title: Dallas police believe 3 recent shootings at Asian-owned businesses may be connected and hate-motivated - CNN
articles.description: Dallas police believe three recent shootings at Asian-run businesses in the area may be connected, and may be hate-motivated, Chief Edgardo Garcia said in a Friday news conference.
